title: Support Main is LF DuoQ Partner [ADC or JGL] DIAMOND ONLY
body:
Hello.
I am searching for a **duoq mate** with a soloq status of Diamond 3+ in last Season and Diamond 5+ this Season.

What do u need/have to be like?:
- TS3 / Skype with a proper Mic
- Diamond 3+ in S5, and Diamond 5+ in S6
- Be a MAIN **Jungler** or a MAIN **ADC**
- **FOCUS** (/taking it serious)
- noflame
- Language: GER / ENG
- stable internet connection + ping below 50ms


What am I offering?:
- Dia2 in S5 Main Sup (Dia1 peaked); in S6 Dia 5, second position is mid
- [LoLSkill](http://www.lolskill.net/summoner/EUW/Quiet%20Guy)
- [LoLKing](http://www.lolking.net/summoner/euw/33920731)
- focussing
- shotcalling/pinging
- aim to reach Master
- GER/ENG


I'm hoping to find a duoq partner to have nice games and climb divisions :)

replies.body: hey im dia 3 main adc (german) and search for a main supp (dia 3 s5) got teamspeak
